mapper.update: update f_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_pwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img_url = #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_time = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, m_time = #{mTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_pwd, name, head_img_url, phone, c_time, m_time, company_id from f_user
